text: Why is Base.SecretBuffer not exported and documented? <https://docs.julialang.org/en/v1/search/?q=secretbuffer>

elements.text: Why is Base.SecretBuffer not exported and documented?

text: It was really the _bare minimum_ that was required to make LibGit2 work. It’d be good to do an API review, add documentation, and export it at some point

elements.text: that was required to make LibGit2 work. It’d be good to do an API review, add documentation, and export it at some point
